rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Could it be... you spent the money
you got from Chairman Bahn and now
you can't buy the Abyss Vest, mo?

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0004
rows.name:
It's only natural to remember the
price of something you want, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0005
rows.name:
But what's spent is spent, so for
this one time only, the rich Kanekane
will bestow 5000G upon you, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0006
rows.name:
But there won't be a next time,
mo! You should go buy the Abyss
Vest before you forget, mo!

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0101
rows.name: Rex, why do you look so desperate, mo?

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0102
rows.name:
Could it be... you spent the money you
got from Chairman Bahn and now you
can't send any to Aunt Correl, mo?

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0104
rows.name:
You should have known
you needed 90,000G, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0105
rows.name:
So why would you do
something like that...?

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0106
rows.name:
But what's spent is spent, so for
this one time only, the rich Kanekane
will bestow 90,000G upon you, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350192_01_msg0107
rows.name:
But there won't be a next time,
mo! Make sure you send this
90,000G to Iyasaki Village, mo!
